sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,l.maxLgtime, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat ,dev.dev_count from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid inner join ( SELECT login.user_id, case when login.maxLgtime<='2016-05-30 00:00:00' then '2016-05-30 00:00:00' else login.maxLgtime end maxLgtime FROM (SELECT user_id,max(login_time) maxLgtime FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log group by user_id) login ) l on u.user_id=l.user_id cross JOIN ( select ceiling(count(developer_id)/100)*100 as dev_count From b2b_company.uuc_developer ) dev where u.user_biz_type=2 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.maxLgtime)=11

select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,l.maxLgtime, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid inner join ( SELECT user_id,max(login_time) maxLgtime FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log group by user_id ) l on u.user_id=l.user_id where u.user_biz_type=2 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.maxLgtime)=61

select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,l.maxLgtime, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat,c0.last_month,c0.dev_num,c0.business_num,c0.supp_in_storage_num from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid inner join ( SELECT user_id,max(login_time) maxLgtime FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log group by user_id ) l on u.user_id=l.user_id cross JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) last_month, COUNT(DISTINCT zz.company_id) dev_num, COUNT(1) business_num, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier_category where MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND create_type in (1,2) ) supp_in_storage_num FROM ( SELECT developer_uid company_id,uid item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements WHERE MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) UNION ALL SELECT company_id,item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item WHERE MONTH(create_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) ) zz )c0 where u.user_biz_type=2 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.maxLgtime)=91

parameter.key: #上月发布商机的开发商个数#

sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,l.maxLgtime, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat,c0.last_month,c0.dev_num,c0.business_num,c0.supp_in_storage_num from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid inner join ( SELECT user_id,max(login_time) maxLgtime FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log group by user_id ) l on u.user_id=l.user_id cross JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) last_month, COUNT(DISTINCT zz.company_id) dev_num, COUNT(1) business_num, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier_category where MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND create_type in (1,2) ) supp_in_storage_num FROM ( SELECT developer_uid company_id,uid item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements WHERE MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) UNION ALL SELECT company_id,item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item WHERE MONTH(create_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) ) zz )c0 where u.user_biz_type=2 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.maxLgtime)=121

parameter.key: #上月发布商机的开发商个数#

sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,l.maxLgtime, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat,c0.last_month,c0.dev_num,c0.business_num,c0.supp_in_storage_num from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid inner join ( SELECT user_id,max(login_time) maxLgtime FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log group by user_id ) l on u.user_id=l.user_id cross JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) last_month, COUNT(DISTINCT zz.company_id) dev_num, COUNT(1) business_num, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier_category where MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND create_type in (1,2) ) supp_in_storage_num FROM ( SELECT developer_uid company_id,uid item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements WHERE MONTH(created_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) UNION ALL SELECT company_id,item_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item WHERE MONTH(create_time)=MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) ) zz )c0 where u.user_biz_type=2 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.maxLgtime)=151

parameter.key: #上月发布商机的开发商个数#
